channel.title: [PI] Pest Control Problem [PI]
channel.description: Feel like a noob for asking this and i can't find the problem, but when ever i try to buy something from the pest control shop nothing happens. The shop is completely set up and only takes pest control points so im assuming its something wrong with the method... Any help Please???

item.title: [PI] Pest Control Problem [PI]
item.dc:creator: @RiiPiiNFtW RiiPiiNFtW
item.description:
@RiiPiiNFtW wrote:

So do you think it would work to put: if (c.pcPoints >= TotPrice2) { if (c.getItems().freeSlots() > 0) { //buyDelay = System.currentTimeMillis(); c.pcPoints -= TotPrice2; c.getItems().addItem(itemID, 1); Server.shopHandler.ShopItemsN[c.myShopId][fromSlot] -= 1; Server.shopHandler.ShopItemsDelay[c.myShopId][fromSlot] = 0; if ((fromSlot + 1) > Server.shopHandler.ShopItemsStandard[c.myShopId]) { Server.shopHandler.ShopItems[c.myShopId][fromSlot] = 0; } } else { c.sendMessage("You don't have enough space in your inventory."); break; } } else { c.sendMessage("You don't have enough PC Points."); break; } }
